# 恋爱读心术

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lianai-duxinshu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lianai-duxinshu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lianai-duxinshu
lianai-duxinshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lianai-duxinshu
lianai-duxinshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
